overview: Levchik, the owner of an Internet cafe, got into jail for financial fraud. His cellmates - the authority Zhuk and the repeat offender Kolyan quickly realized that Levchik had considerable grandmothers left in the wild.  But they could not know that the criminally acquired money was pocketed by Levchik’s native aunt, the healer Maria Immaculate.
title: Nephew, or Russian business 2
